response:
Right-sided spastic hemiparesis with brisk reflexes and extensor plantar response, together with contralateral (right) hemisensory impairment, indicates a left-sided supraspinal lesion above the pyramidal decussation. Ipsilateral (left) LMN facial weakness, ipsilateral limb hypotonia and cerebellar ataxia with gaze-evoked nystagmus localise further to a single lesion in the left pons involving the facial nucleus/fascicle, cerebellar connections and descending motor and ascending sensory pathways.

lesion_locations = ["left pons"]
